title: Characteristics of an exponential function
text: Recall that an exponential function with the form $$f(x)=b^x$$, $$b>0$$, where b does not equal 1, has these characteristics: 1. one-to-one function 2. horizontal asymptote: y $$=$$ 0 3. domain: $$(-\infty,\infty)$$ 4. range: $$(0,\infty)$$ 5. x-intercept: none 6. y-intercept: (0,1) 7. increasing if b > 1 8. decreasing if b < 1
